column4: i am so impressed with ubuntu. I just upgraded from Hoary to Breezy with no problems at all, even crossover office still works after the upgrade!
soon it'll be breezy to dapper

well, i remember trying the dist-upgrade when breezy was still in beta and it didn't work so well, so maybe I'll wait until dapper is release, or even some months after that (in case it makes a difference)...
